name: Points Destroyed
description:
First, input the name and value of each ship in your list and your opponents list. Then you'll be able to keep track of the status of each ship (Full/Half/Dead) and run what-if scenarios quickly.

With all ships providing half-points in 2nd edition, and with the new round up rules, tracking points totals for competing tie-swarms can distract you from what you should be focusing on, flying. This tool alleviates that problem.
